'''''Minecraft: Pixel Genesis''''' is a remix album featuring compositions by [[Lena Raine]], [[Kumi Tanioka]], and [[Aaron Cherof]] with remixes by [[Hyper Potions]], Synthion, AIKA, leon chang, Snail's House, Elliot Hsu, and Anamanaguchi. It remixes tracks from ''[[Minecraft: Tricky Trials (Original Game Soundtrack)]]'' and "[[Infinite Amethyst]]," from ''[[Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs (Original Game Soundtrack)]]''. It was released on September 13, 2024.<ref>{{ytl|Jj74tRQuC9w|Minecraft Pixel Remixes|Minecraft|September 13, 2024}}</ref> The album's cover art and the accompanying animated videos were created by Martin WÃ¶rister.<ref>{{tweet|adrian_ivl|1834608552717009007|The amazing pixel art is done by @miascugh !|September 13, 2024}}</ref>
